page.title: 02DAY IN THE LIFE OF A PUPIL
page.content: My name is Louise Williamson I am at the Gordon Schools Huntly. I get up at 7am and catch the bus at 8.10am. When I get to school there is assembly which starts around 9am. At assembly the rector reads a short passage from a book.After that there are some anouncements. At the end everyone goes off to their own class. My best class is Home Economics because I Iike cooking and sewing. At dinner time there is a school canteen and anyone can staybut you must have a dinner ticket which you can get at interval. After I get home from school I watch TV most of the time and sometimes I help my dad.On Mondays I go to dancing I do Highland,National and Tap and on Thursdays I go to Karate.
